body.name: Bidet Attachment for Toilet, Adjustable Pressure Control &Self-Cleaning Dual Nozzle (Feminine/Bidet Wash) Toilet Bidet, Cold Water Sprayer Bidets for Existing Toilets
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 13 hrs 45 mins
features: 【DUAL NOZZLE MODE】Equipped with 2 nozzles, simply turn the dial and set to rear cleansing or feminine cleansing modes. Split nozzle with multi angle cleaning, making it more safe for home use.

【ADJUSTABLE WATER PRESSURE】Adjust to your preference, whether that's a light mist or a strong jet stream, with the simple twist of the dial. Setting the toilet water sprayer to your desired pressure level, treating the skin gently, reduce sensitivity, and make it more comfortable.

【EASY INSTALLATION】Including in box everything you need to install the toilet seat bidet in a break, offering installation instruction and vedio so that mothers or single womens also can install it well. In addition, bidet sprayer fits most toilets.
【LUXURY BATHROOM DECORATION】A high-quality texture paired with a clean bathroom is more fashionable, reduces the use of toilet paper, and is more environmentally friendly and scientific.
【SELF CLEANSING NOZZLES】 The toilet water sprayer with self-cleaning mode not requires cleaning the attachment and the toilet can be rinsed multiple times to remove odors and dirt.
body.description: The essential water modern bidet attachment. Pressure controlled front and rear wash leaves you feeling fresh and perfectly clean. Full Features Modern Design: Slim design for minimal seat interference Fits round and elongated toilets Large, easy-to-use dials Everything included for standard install Perfect Washes: Separate front and rear nozzles Rear wash is for everyone’s backside, targeted to hit the right spot Front wash is angled slightly forward with a softer spray pattern Precise pressure control, from a soft spritz to full pressure Safe Self-rinsing system runs fresh water over both nozzles before and after each use Nozzles stay retracted when not in use

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: We have moved this around to two different toilet with different shapes in our house and it fits both. Powerful spraying jet

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 30, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The bidet attachment for the toilet is easy to use. Easy to connect. Thanks to the presence of two handles, control is accessible even to a child.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This is our second bidet, myHusband installed one in the primary bathroom when I was nearing the end of my twin pregnancy, it helped a lot with recovery and has been an awesome tool since then as well. I got this one for our downstairs bathroom, the one most used, and it was super easy to install, the instructions are straightforward and it's super easy to use and clean. It does have surprisingly strong pressure, so be very careful when you're getting used to it to slowly turn it up, lest you give yourself another booty hole but it works really well, it keeps things a lot cleaner than toilet paper and is pretty ✨fancy✨it's a super simple and quiet flex that people are super impressed with, thinking it's so insanely bougie when it's literally already paid for itself in money saved on buying toilet paper

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Not just for poops, Ladies
reviews.reviewText: This bidet has changed my life. Not just from poops, but from periods too. I love that it has a "woman cleaning" option.It was easy to set up, easier than I expected. The first couple of uses were jarring. Like sitting on an icicle. (especially since it is winter) But once I got use to it, it was quite refreshing.The only issue I have with it, is the pressure goes from a soft stream to accidental enema with nothing in between. So be careful.The nozzle cleaning is a nice addition. As well as the raised arrow so you can feel where the dial is pointing before you shoot.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Did not fit
reviews.reviewText: The tee that is included to attach between the toilet and supply line never successfully fit without a horrible leak- simply not designed to attach to a toilet with shallow threads.Fix the tee, and I'm eager to try it out, but for now, it's sitting in the box until I can sort that out.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Cleaner than Charmin
reviews.reviewText: "If you accidentally get poop on your finger, would you just wipe it off with a paper towel and say that it's clean?"THAT was the moment I knew that I wanted -- nay -- NEEDED a bidet! The easily affordable price was the first mind-blowing piece of reality. Second was how fast it would get here and the third was the easy installation my husband still wants a parade for.You don't want to hear the fourth because it refers to levels of bodily sanitation-based satisfaction that even I still can't dream of. It reaches all of your parts with a powerful current --or a gentle stream (it's your choice) of water that removes all evidence that your bowel had a movement. It's would be 5 stars if not for the fact that the water can, at times, be too strong and do ruin to the sensitive underbottom. I recommend to everyone, though.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This was pretty easy to install and works decent in my opinion. No bad things to say about it. Love the two different angle options but be warned it’s strong!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 4, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I really like how easy this was to install and get working with good instructions and videos to help. Seems like a good value in the market. Looking forward to reducing dependence on paper products and clean vibes.
